title: Elementary Music Teacher K-5 and Interventionist (for current school year)
status: Full Time, 1 FTEMinimum Requirements:Active Elementary Teaching License with proper endorsements authorizing areas assigned.BTS Specialist - Music Degree or Music Endorsement required.The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.For new hires & rehires, WCSD will recognize no more than thirteen full time, complete years of previous teaching experience when placing on the TT Salary Schedule.
